name: kld
comment: Command-line utility for interacting with the kernel linker
desc:
This utility is meant to combine the kld* family of commands (kldload, kldstat, kldunload, &c) into a single command to interact with the kernel linker (list available/loaded kernel modules, load them, &c).
The functionality kldconfig provided is now exclusively managed through the kern.module_path sysctl.

WWW: https://github.com/inobulles/aquabsd-core
